Articles.Content: I DUST implant my way into a new clone, and the gravity destroys the next 5 posters into a parallel universe. also I shoot the next poster

Your munitions must be damp, because I felt no pain .

The next user is catapulted from a catapult, toward space.

As I silently float through the endless darkness of space, propelled by the previuos poster's catapult. I think to myself.

"What will death be?"

"Will I dream...? Or will I fade into nonthingness, crushed by the harsh reality that I, a poster, have been forced into...."

Then I realize I remembered to bring my emergency space unicorn summoner kit and fly back into the atmosphere to shoot a rainbow laser at the next poster.

friendship is STOOPID magic

I kill the next poster

I am alive in an alternate universe/

I trap the next poster in a math class with no hope of escape.

Except you exaggerated. The class is out the second I'm in .

The next user is trapped in a real Code Red (really Run-Hide-Defend) event, and he/she is only feet away from the suspect...

The suspect is a pizza delivery guy that accidentally added unwanted toppings.

The next poster is about to be hit by a ship going at warp 9.5.

I am a warp 10.

next poster is abducted by aliens

I bribe the aliens with snacks.

I eat all of the next poster's snacks.
I then remove bacteria and viruses from sewage and consume that, while injecting the still-living pathogens into the next poster's bloodstream.

Luckily, I'm immune.

The next poster is the unfortunate recipient of one of Elsa's icy blasts to the heart. Good luck with that.

Luckily, I'm immune.

The next poster is the unfortunate recipient of one of Elsa's icy blasts to the heart. Good luck with that.

That would require having a heart.

The next poster is subject to one of Ted's Icy Stares.

That would require having a soul for him to gaze upon.

The next poster is mortally wounded by way of my favourite katana.

(takes cough pills)

The next user suddenly has 10 ostriches in his living room.

I shoot them.

the next poster is attacked by space captains

I bring my space pirates friends to the party.

The next poster now has to deal with the said space pirates.

I use my anti space pirate missile.

I redirect an asteroid to hit the next poster.

(has anybody else noticed that this thread is on page 100 now and the 1,000th post is coming soon because this is post 992)

1000th post!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! also that defeats everthing

Actually, all of your posts were consolidated to only the 993rd post.

My hill.

[Edit] Dang, I got the forum games mixed up again.

Edited November 25, 2014 by mikeman7918

*gets back on thread* I use Bruce Willis to drill a nuke to the core and Michael Bay that scrub

The next poster has to deal with the Aliens left stranded without a home cuz we blew it up

I teleport them to random places in the universe.

I do the same to the next poster.

Well, I resist.

I fire 998 beams into the next poster, since they are post #998.

I use a mirror to reflect them away.

The next poster will make it possible for the poster after them to me poster #1,000.

You're welcome.

The next poster is attacked by zeroes.

POST #1000!

The next poster is in space without a space suit.
